timeline.message: Fix: Updating how we check if the Jira App is installed. Updating the BlackDuckResponseCache to prevent misleading logging.

timeline.bodyText: Changed this logging because this was logging error messages and stack traces for components that were deleted. So I changed the logging to DEBUG and changed the stack trace to be logged at TRACE so that the User won't be confused and so we can still get the information if needed.
timeline.author: jamesrichard91
